paramInformation.label: Open Window Detect function
paramInformation.description: When use radiator to heating,the window is opened,when room temperature drop 6℃ in 4 min,TRV will close valve automatic,display will show ” ”

paramInformation.label: Anti-freezing function
paramInformation.description: Anti-freezing function: the valve will be opened when the temperature is below 5℃,when the temperature risees to 8℃,the valve will be closed.

paramInformation.label: Anti-scale function
paramInformation.description: If radiator not open within two weeks or long time not open will let valve clogged as scale, radiator will be damaged. In order to let radiator to 0 12 use normally, TRV will open valve running 30 seconds every two weeks, display will show “ ”

paramInformation.label: Valve opening level report threshold
paramInformation.description: Valve opening level change threshold. The unit = %

paramInformation.label: Temperature auto report interval time
paramInformation.description: The time interval when to send the temperature report. The unit= second

paramInformation.label: Battery auto report interval time
paramInformation.description: The time interval when to send the battery report. The unit= second

paramInformation.label: Battery change report treshold
paramInformation.description: Battery power change threshold. The unit = %
